posts.raw_content:
Lady at my job, looks very liberal, tattoos, possibly a single mother, shorter hair, just LOOKS liberal.  In a liberal profession at a liberal workplace (yeah, I always get jobs at places run and staffed by liberals).  Anyway, this morning she's very quiet.  Eventually, someone talks to her, and she admits shes been thinking about "that guy, Charlie, who was assassinated" the whole morning!  She then says "I didn't know who he was, so I was watching some videos, and he was so eloquent."  And she said this aloud in a roomfull of 10 people.

Yes, maybe not a huge deal.  BUT, it seemed like her mind was opened in some way.  This tragic incident, like many political assassinations, may show people truth and honesty, which they wouldn't have seen before.

God Bless you and your family, Charlie.
